gardens.name: Community Garden
gardens.description: A sustainable community garden focused on organic vegetables and herbs. Open to all community members who want to learn about sustainable gardening practices.

gardens.name: Urban Farm Collective
gardens.description: An urban farming initiative that transforms vacant lots into productive agricultural spaces. Focuses on food security and community education.

gardens.name: School Garden Project
gardens.description: Educational garden at Lincoln Elementary School teaching children about plant life cycles, nutrition, and environmental stewardship.
gardens.location: 789 School Lane, Lincoln Elementary, City, State 12345
